casebody.data:
No. 10-721. Sensient Technologies Corporation, et al., Petitioners v. SensoryEffects Flavor Company, fka SensoryFlavors, Inc., et al. 562 U.S. 1270, 131 S. Ct. 1603,

179 L. Ed. 2d 500,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 2081. March 7, 2011.

Petition for writ of cer-tiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eighth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 613 F.3d 754.
